Title: Allows for the donation of personal property of the state to certain not-for-profit organizations
Summary: Allows for the donation of personal property of the state to certain not-for-profit organizations that are up to date on annual filings.
LawCode: Amd ยง167, St Fin L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the state finance law, in relation to allowing for the donation of personal property of the state to certain not-for-profit organizations
